title: Overall Drawing
publication_title: James Ensor: The Temptation of Saint Anthony
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section body" id="body">In this overall view of The Temptation of Saint Anthony, the white grid outlines the fifty-one sheets and folios of which the drawing is composed. Hover over the image and various tools will appear.

- • The slider tool in the lower right corner permits you to turn the grid off (slide left) and on (slide right).
- • The zoom bar in the upper right allows you to take a closer look at the drawing.
- • The letters and numbers (1A/B, 3A, 6A, etc.) throughout identify the individual sheets and folios. Click “View” to jump to the section about this particular sheet or folio in order to delve more deeply into this part of the drawing.

</section><section id="figures"></section>
